headline: Did Alpha Modus’ Expanded AI Patent Claims Just Shift Kroger's (KR) Investment Narrative?
summary: Alpha Modus Corp. recently filed an amended patent infringement complaint against The Kroger Co., adding two more patents and alleging Kroger’s use of various AI-powered retail and analytics systems infringes a broadened portfolio of intellectual property. This significant escalation spotlights ongoing legal risks for retailers embracing in-store AI technologies, with Kroger's digital transformation efforts drawing increased scrutiny around intellectual property rights. We'll now assess how...
